## Bio

Elizabeth Crespi studies programs and policies related to food and climate. 
Her research focuses on identifying and optimizing solutions to environmental health 
challenges facing our society, particularly pertaining to food system sustainability. 
Elizabeth has worked directly with non-profits in Baltimore City focused on building 
a more sustainable and equitable food system through urban farming. In her free time, 
Elizabeth enjoys tending to her garden & food forest, playing with her cats, and hiking.
